short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hypertrons Chromium Extension for GitHub and other document websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hypercrx project adds analytic dashboards to GitHub, aiming at tracing, digging and gaining insight into the projects and developers you're interested in. We do this by inserting useful dashboards into GitHub pages. Hypercrx provides an effective way for digital operations and analysis of open source community.

Features:

ğŸ“Œ Adds labels for OpenRank, activity, contributors, and participants to repository headers
ğŸ“‘ Shows detailed information on repository issues
ğŸ”— Visualizes relationships between repositories
ğŸ”€ Provides detailed information on pull requests
â­ Shows detailed information on repository stars

Download now and transform the way you navigate and contribute to GitHub projects!
